unnormalised: Indian Railways, bless its heart, has outdone itself again. Apparently, Train No. 12345, the Kolkata Mail, decided to take the "scenic route" yesterday. Scheduled to arrive in Chennai at 6:00 AM, it finally chugged in at, get this, 3:00 PM. Yes, you read that right. 9 hrs late! Passengers reportedly started a chai-and-samosa party on board to kill time. One aunty even started teaching everyone Bollywood dance moves.

unnormalised: A railway official, when asked about the delay, blamed it on "operational inefficiencies" and "unforeseen circumstances." Unforeseen circumstances, you say? Who knows!
